Article Title: Australian conservationist Robert Irwin brings a wild twist to the NFL Draft from Australia Zoo
Article Text:
Robert Irwin, with a snake around his shoulders, announced the Rams' selection of Konata Mumpfield from Australia Zoo (Getty Images)

Robert Irwin announces Los Angeles Rams' 2025 NFL Draft pick from Pennsylvania

Konata Mumpfield‚Äôs college career at Pitt showcased his NFL potential

In a heartwarming and unexpected moment during the 2025 NFL Draft, Australian wildlife conservationist Robert Irwin took center stage to announce a late-round draft pick ‚Äî and he did it in true Aussie style. Speaking from the Australia Zoo in Queensland, Irwin, with a massive snake draped casually around his shoulders, revealed the Los Angeles Rams ‚Äô selection at pick No. 242: Konata Mumpfield, a standout wide receiver from the University of Pittsburgh.The NFL has increasingly sought to create unique and memorable moments during its annual draft, and this year was no exception. In a video posted by the league, Robert Irwin's announcement merged wildlife conservation and football excitement in a way only he could deliver. His appearance, complete with a snake companion, was both a nod to his famous late father Steve Irwin‚Äôs legacy and a testament to the NFL‚Äôs growing international reach.This special moment not only delighted NFL fans but also introduced a broader audience to the late stages of the draft, a time when hidden gems like Mumpfield often get their start.Konata Mumpfield‚Äôs journey to the NFL wasn‚Äôt paved with flashy headlines, but his on-field performance spoke volumes. During the 2024 season with the Pittsburgh Panthers, Mumpfield compiled 52 receptions for 813 yards, averaging an impressive 15.6 yards per catch. His five touchdowns helped solidify his status as a reliable playmaker and earned him an All-ACC Honorable Mention.Statistically, Mumpfield led Pitt in receptions (tied), receiving yards, and yards per catch ‚Äî clear evidence of his crucial role in the Panthers‚Äô offense.While Mumpfield might not possess elite size or blazing speed, scouts believe his technical skills will help him thrive in the NFL. "What Mumpfield lacks in size and speed for the position, he makes up for with outstanding route running and a professional mentality," noted respected NFL analyst Eric Edholm.Also Read: "It's a quiet rebellion‚Äù: Jason Kelce slammed for "quietly" supporting Donald Trump‚Äôs America First movement with new fashion line Landing Mumpfield in the seventh round could prove to be a savvy move for the Rams, a franchise known for uncovering talent in unexpected places. His precision as a route runner, combined with his work ethic, gives him a legitimate shot to contribute at the professional level.With Robert Irwin's memorable announcement, Konata Mumpfield‚Äôs NFL journey already has a wild beginning ‚Äî and if his college track record is any indication, the best is yet to come.
Article Summary: Konata mumpfield, a wide receiver for the pittsburgh panthers, was selected by the los angeles rams in the 2025 nfl draft. Australian wildlife conservationist robert irwin made the announcement from the australia zoo in queensland. His appearance, complete with a snake companion, was both a nod to his famous late father steve irwin‚Äôs legacy.

Article Title: MS Dhoni finally loses cool after CSK loss, says 'you can't just keep ... '
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Should CSK consider making major changes to their lineup? No, they should stick with current players Yes, it's necessary

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: The expression on captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni ‚Äôs face said it all as Chennai Super Kings suffered another defeat‚Äîthis time a five-wicket loss to Sunrisers Hyderabad at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai on Friday. A visibly disappointed Dhoni admitted that a total of 154 was far from ‚Äújustifiable‚Äù on a Chepauk pitch that didn‚Äôt have any demons, as SRH dealt a near-fatal blow to CSK‚Äôs IPL 2025 play-off chances.Sunrisers chased down the modest target in just 18.4 overs. Dhoni pointed out that it's always tough when several players fail to deliver simultaneously.He also believed that SRH batted under slightly tougher conditions in the second innings, yet CSK couldn't capitalise. For the skipper, the lack of cohesion in the team's overall effort was most frustrating."I think we kept losing wickets and another thing is in the first innings the wicket was slightly better and 157 wasn't a justifiable score," Dhoni said after CSK‚Äôs loss."It wasn't turning a lot, a little two-paced but nothing out of the ordinary. Yes, second innings there was a bit of help. Our spinners, the quality was there and they were bowling in the right areas, but we were 15-20 runs short," he added.Also See: IPL Live Score, KKR vs PBKS Commenting on Dewald Brevis‚Äô performance, Dhoni said, "[On Brevis] I think he batted really well and we needed that in the middle order. When the spinners come in, you do it either by batsmanship or picking the right areas, but that's an area where we want to improve because middle overs are crucial."Reflecting on the broader issues plaguing the team, Dhoni didn‚Äôt hold back."In a tournament like this, if there are one or two areas to plug in the holes it's good, but when a majority of the players are not doing well you need to make changes. You can't just keep going. We are just not putting enough runs on the board," he said.With this win, SRH have moved up to eighth place on the points table, registering three wins and six losses for a total of six points.CSK, meanwhile, sit at the bottom with just two wins from nine games and only four points to show.
Article Summary: Chennai super kings lost to sunrisers hyderabad by five wickets on friday. Captain mahendra singh dhoni said csk's total of 154 was not "justifiable" dhoni also said the lack of cohesion in the team's overall effort was frustrating.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI would have called off the wedding‚Äù: Fans urge Josh Allen to rethink wedding after Hailee Steinfeld‚Äôs steamy chemistry with Michael B. Jordan
Article Text: Hailee Steinfeld and Josh Allen's engagement is now facing fan speculation due to Steinfeld's sizzling onscreen chemistry with Michael B. Jordan in 'Sinners.' Despite the buzz, Steinfeld has expressed her love for Buffalo and her connection to the city.

Article Title: New Record! Prabhsimran Singh becomes first uncapped Punjab Kings batter to ...
Article Text:
Punjab Kings' Prabhsimran Singh plays a shot at the Eden Gardens. (PTI Photo)

Also visit:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think Prabhsimran Singh will continue to be a key player for Punjab Kings this season? He will improve further It's hard to say No, he might struggle Yes, absolutely

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Prabhsimran Singh etched his name into Punjab Kings ' history books on Saturday, becoming the first uncapped batter from the franchise to cross the 1000-run milestone in the Indian Premier League . The young opener achieved the landmark during his scintillating knock of 83 off 49 balls against Kolkata Knight Riders at Eden Gardens.Prabhsimran‚Äôs innings, studded with six sixes and six fours, was instrumental in powering Punjab Kings to a commanding 201 for 4 after skipper Shreyas Iyer won the toss and opted to bat first. The Patiala-born batter stitched a brilliant 120-run opening stand with Priyansh Arya , who blazed away to a 35-ball 69, laying the perfect foundation for a big total.With Saturday‚Äôs innings, Prabhsimran now has 1048 runs from 43 matches, including one century and five fifties for PBKS. He surpassed former Punjab batter Manan Vohra , who previously held the record among uncapped players with 957 runs in 45 games.The 24-year-old has grown into a crucial pillar for Punjab‚Äôs top order and remains central to their title ambitions this season. His consistency has been particularly crucial, with Punjab aiming for their maiden IPL crown.Among current PBKS players, Shashank Singh follows with 512 runs in 23 matches, while former stars Paul Valthaty (499 runs in 21 matches) and Shahrukh Khan (426 runs in 33 matches) round out the list.Meanwhile, Prabhsimran‚Äôs new opening partner Priyansh Arya continues to impress in his debut IPL season, already amassing 323 runs in nine games, further strengthening Punjab‚Äôs top order for the playoff push.
Article Summary: Prabhsimran singh becomes the first uncapped batter from punjab kings to cross the 1000-run milestone in the indian premier league. The young opener achieved the landmark during his scintillating knock of 83 off 49 balls against kolkata knight riders at eden gardens.

Article Title: Michael Strahan stands by FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer through a heartbreaking time days after announcing his new venture
Article Text:
Michael Strahan is partnering with Michael Vick.(Image via Michael Le Brecht II/ABC via Getty)

Michael Strahan proves he is there for his FOX Sports‚Äô colleague as he goes through a tough time



Is Michael Strahan taking on a new responsibility?



Michael Strahan, the NFL legend and the host of Good Morning America, has taken on a new career along with hosting. Recently, the NFL legend announced his new venture but amidst all the excitement, Michael Strahan paid a tribute to FOX Sports ‚Äô NFL Insider, Jay Glazer‚Äôs heartfelt tribute to his father. FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer recently took to his social media to post about his father in a heartbreaking post but it was Michael Strahan‚Äôs comment that showed how much he cares about his colleagues.FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer posted a heartbreaking picture of a black coffin that carried his father, a few hours ago. The caption for the post read as, ‚ÄúTake care dad. Beautiful day, beautiful turnout, I‚Äôm sure he loved it!! RIP Ed Glazer. Love ya big guy.‚ÄùThe NFL legend, Michael Strahan dropped a heartwarming comment that read as, ‚Äú‚ù§Ô∏èüôè‚Äù, as a way to show support to his colleague.A few days ago FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer announced his father‚Äôs demise with a happy picture of his father and a heartbreaking caption.The caption read as, ‚ÄúDuring our visit, he said knew he was heading to the other side, I asked if he good with it. He was‚Ä¶We had a really good goodbye. I get to remember THAT, which is a gift. Pretty surreal conversation. But I was able to leave him with gratitude.‚ÄùA few days ago, Michael Strahan announced his new venture for which he is teaming up with former NFL player, Michael Vick , to create a documentary on Vick‚Äôs new life at Norfolk State University where he would be joining as a head coach for their football team.Michael Strahan‚Äôs SMAC Entertainment will be partnering with BET Media Group for this documentary.Michael Strahan spoke about his new venture and said, ‚ÄúI know first-hand the power that HBCUS have on a community and the opportunity they give to so many student-athletes.‚ÄùHe added, ‚ÄúMichael Vick‚Äôs commitment to impacting these young men‚Äôs lives and passing along the gifts that football provided to him is so inspiring. I‚Äôm excited for fans to join on his journey with Norfolk State University.‚ÄùAt the moment, Michael Strahan is spending all his time with his children after his daughter, Isabella Strahan recently recovered from brain cancer.Michael Strahan has also appeared with Isabella Strahan in many interviews as he teared up while recollecting the mental toll his daughter‚Äôs illness had on him.Despite being divorced from his ex wife, Michael Strahan and her came together to be with their daughter as she fought a tough battle against cancer. Isabella Strahan has now fully recovered from cancer and has gone back to college at the University of Southern California.Michael Strahan's daughter, Isabella Strahan was recently spotted enjoying her time in Coachella with her close friends. She was also vacationing in the Bahamas a few weeks ago with her twin sister, Sophia Strahan and their close friends. The 20 year old went back to college at the University of Southern California in August 2024.Also Read: Lil Wayne shocks fans with new NFL announcement days after slamming the league over Super Bowl halftime snub
Article Summary: Michael strahan is partnering with michael vick. The nfl legend and the host of good morning america, has taken on a new career along with hosting. Recently, the nfl legend announced his new venture but amidst all the excitement, michael strahan paid a tribute to his fox sports colleague.

Article Title: 'You don't need to prove your patriotism': Yogeshwar Dutt in support of Neeraj Chopra after social media abuse
Article Text:
File photos of Olympic medallists Yogeshwar Dutt (L) and Neeraj Chopra (R).

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Former India wrestler Yogeshwar Dutt came out in support of javelin thrower Neeraj Chopra on Saturday, a day after the two-time Olympic medallist issued a strongly-worded statement at social media abuse . In a post, Chopra said he had been bombarded with "hate and abuse" for inviting Pakistan's Arshad Nadeem to next month's NC Classic in Bengaluru.Chopra clarified that the Paris Olympic champion's presence was "completely out of question" in the aftermath of the Pahalgam terror attack which claimed 26 lives. The Tokyo Olympics gold-medallist and Paris Games silver-winning star said he was deeply hurt to see his and his family's integrity being questioned.2012 London Olympics bronze medallist Yogeshwar Dutt urged Neeraj to not prove his patriotism to anyone while lauding the "leader of the nation.""Neeraj Bhai, you neither need to prove your patriotism nor prove yourself. It is only a sportsperson and a soldier who raises the tricolour flag on foreign soil and glorifies the name of the country. And you are a soldier along with being a sportsperson."These people who speak nonsense are those trivial ideological people who are neither concerned about the country nor patriotism."You are a champion, you are the leader of the nation, keep moving ahead like this."The champion is always the best," wrote the two-time Asian Games and Commonwealth Games medallist.Chopra had invited Nadeem, who defeated the Indian in Paris last year to win gold, for the inaugural Neeraj Chopra Classic next month."After all that has taken place over the last 48 hours, Arshad's presence at the NC Classic was completely out of the question. My country and its interests will always come first," Chopra, who is a Subedar Major in the Indian Army, said in a lengthy post on 'X'."To those that are going through the loss of their people, my thoughts and prayers are with you. Along with the entire nation, I am both hurt and angry at what has taken place," said Chopra."I am confident that our country's response will show our strength as a nation and justice will be served," he added.Nadeem had declined to compete at the NC Classic citing other commitments.
Article Summary: Neeraj chopra had invited pakistan's arshad nadeem to next month's nc classic in bengaluru. Chopra clarified that the paris olympic champion's presence was "completely out of question" in the aftermath of the pahalgam terror attack. Yogeshwar dutt urged neeraj to not prove his patriotism to anyone while lauding the "leader of the nation"

Article Title: Buccaneers sign 464-pound Desmond Watson, the heaviest player in NFL history, as undrafted free agent
Article Text:
Undrafted and 464 pounds, Desmond Watson gets NFL opportunity with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers (Credit: AP Photos)

Desmond Watson signs with Buccaneers, becomes heaviest player ever to join an NFL team



After going undrafted in the 2025 NFL Draft, Desmond Watson , one of the Florida Gators ' most beloved fan favorites, has landed a spot with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers . The towering 6-foot-5, 464-pound defensive tackle inked an undrafted free agent contract with the Buccaneers just moments after the draft ended, marking him as the team's first UDFA signing. The contract includes a $20,000 signing bonus and $50,000 in guaranteed money, offering Watson a strong foundation as he embarks on his NFL journey.Desmond Watson's unique combination of size and skill makes him a standout figure in the NFL. At 464 pounds, Watson now holds the record as the heaviest player in NFL history , surpassing the previous record set by offensive tackle Aaron Gibson by an impressive 54 pounds. Watson joins a talented group of nose tackles in Tampa Bay, including Vita Vea and Greg Gaines. Over his collegiate career, Watson accumulated 63 tackles, 1.5 sacks, and a memorable forced fumble and recovery in 2022, which cemented his place in Gators history.Though Watson was not invited to the NFL Scouting Combine, his performance at Florida's Pro Day captured the attention of scouts. He clocked an impressive 5.95-second 40-yard dash, making him the third slowest runner of all time at his size but still managing to impress those in attendance. Additionally, Watson's 36 reps on the bench press would have been the highest at the Combine, demonstrating his raw strength and athleticism despite his considerable size.Tampa Bay's head coach, Billy Napier, praised Watson‚Äôs exceptional abilities. "He's a unicorn. That stature," Napier said at the Pro Day. "And then, you get to know Des. He's extremely intelligent. He's got a great sense of humor. He was a great teammate. Obviously showed up in good shape (for pro day). He'll get his shot, and I'm hoping he'll make the most of it."What makes Watson's journey even more remarkable is his hometown connection to Tampa Bay. Born and raised in Plant City, Florida, Watson will now have the opportunity to play just hours away from where he made his mark both in high school at Armwood and in college with the Gators. This proximity adds an extra layer of excitement as he competes for a spot on the Buccaneers' roster, with the potential to play in front of a familiar Florida crowd in the NFL.While Watson's weight has been a topic of discussion throughout his career, it‚Äôs clear he has made significant strides. Prior to the draft, Watson spoke about his weight management efforts: "There (are) times where I do basically starving and stuff like that... I didn‚Äôt feel confident that way. I didn‚Äôt feel strong, I didn‚Äôt feel fast. I feel like right now is the best I felt with the process of losing weight."Watson‚Äôs commitment to fitness has been evident as he worked with a weight and fitness specialist leading up to the draft. His goal of losing approximately 100 pounds was achieved through a disciplined diet that cut out sugar and starches, relying on peas, beans, chili, and spinach as key components of his meals.As the Buccaneers continue to strengthen their roster, Watson's signing marks a significant opportunity for him to prove himself. The team had already bolstered their edge rushing corps with two new signings in the 2025 draft but left room for a potential interior defensive lineman. With no other interior D-linemen drafted, Watson's chance to compete for a backup role behind Pro Bowler Vita Vea is very much alive.Desmond Watson's path to the NFL may have been unconventional, but his hard work, dedication, and Florida roots have given him the chance to shine at the highest level of football. Whether or not he secures a starting position, one thing is clear‚ÄîWatson‚Äôs journey is just beginning, and fans across Florida will be cheering him on every step of the way.Also Read: "Clueless for 50 years": ESPN‚Äôs Mel Kiper Jr. slams NFL teams for letting Shedeur Sanders slip to fifth round
Article Summary: Desmond watson, a 6-foot-5, 464-pound defensive tackle, is the heaviest player ever to join an nfl team. Watson was not invited to the nfl scouting combine, but his performance at florida's pro day captured the attention of scouts. Watson joins a talented group of nose tackles in tampa bay including vita vea and greg gaines.

Article Title: 'Kya re hero': Rohit Sharma's brutal roast goes viral - Watch
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Who do you think will win the upcoming match between Mumbai Indians and Lucknow Super Giants? Lucknow Super Giants Mumbai Indians

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Rohit Sharma ‚Äôs playful banter has once again stolen the spotlight ahead of Mumbai Indians ‚Äô big clash against Lucknow Super Giants in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025.Also See: KKR vs PBKS, IPL Live Score During a net session, a video posted by Mumbai Indians on X captured Rohit roasting LSG pacer Shardul Thakur , saying, "Kya re hero, abhi aa raha hai, ghar ka team hai kya?" ("Hey hero, you're coming now? Is this your home team?"). The cheeky comment, delivered in Rohit's trademark style, quickly went viral, giving fans a moment of pure entertainment.Rohit, who was sitting next to LSG mentor Zaheer Khan when Shardul arrived late for practice, didn‚Äôt miss the chance to pull his leg, much to the amusement of those around.Watch:While the banter kept spirits high, the upcoming match at Wankhede Stadium promises serious competition.Both Mumbai Indians and Lucknow Super Giants are locked at 10 points after nine games, with MI holding a slight edge thanks to a better net run rate . With playoff spots on the line, every game counts from here.Mumbai are peaking at the right time, riding a wave of four consecutive wins.Rohit Sharma himself has found form, blasting two solid half-centuries recently after a slow start to the season. Support has also come from Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, and Trent Boult, making MI a serious threat.For LSG, the batting core of Nicholas Pooran, Mitchell Marsh, and Aiden Markram has been vital, but consistency will be key if they hope to topple a confident MI unit.With local boy Shardul Thakur leading their bowling attack and young Digvesh Rathi impressing, LSG will hope to stage an upset despite the tough conditions.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians face lucknow super giants in the indian premier league (ipl) 2025. Rohit sharma roasts lsg pacer shardul thakur during a net session. The cheeky comment, delivered in rohit's trademark style, quickly went viral.

Article Title: Kavya Maran's animated reaction to Harshal Patel's drop catch goes viral - Watch!
Article Text:
SRH co-owner Kavya Maran (Video grab)

Also visit:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll What stood out most in the CSK vs SRH match? Harshal Patel‚Äôs impressive 4-wicket haul The viral reaction to the dropped catch

WATCH:

NEW DELHI: While Sunrisers Hyderabad ‚Äôs clinical bowling display against Chennai Super Kings stole the show on the field, it was co-owner Kavya Maran ‚Äôs animated reaction to a dropped catch that lit up social media on Friday night at the MA Chidambaram Stadium .SRH bundled CSK out for 154, with pacer Harshal Patel starring with a four-wicket haul. But during the seventh over, a moment of unexpected drama unfolded that had nothing to do with wickets. Harshal dropped a regulation catch at long-off off the final ball of Zeeshan Ansari ‚Äôs over, giving Ravindra Jadeja a reprieve on 8.What followed wasn‚Äôt just disappointment ‚Äî it was viral gold.Cameras caught Kavya Maran's visibly stunned and expressive reaction in the stand. Her mix of disbelief and frustration quickly captured fans‚Äô imagination online, with the clip flooding social media platforms.Jadeja made 21 off 17 after the let-off, but Harshal bounced back in style. Despite briefly leaving the field to tend to a sore finger, he returned to dismiss Dewald Brevis, MS Dhoni and Noor Ahmad, finishing with figures of 4/28.Maran‚Äôs moment of raw fandom that reminded everyone of the emotional rollercoaster behind the scenes.
Article Summary: Srh co-owner kavya maran's animated reaction to a dropped catch lit up social media. Harshal patel dropped a regulation catch at long-off off the final ball of zeeshan ansari ‚Äôs over, giving ravindra jadeja a reprieve on 8. Her mix of disbelief and frustration quickly captured fans‚Äô imagination online.

Article Title: Ravi Shastri issues warning for Vaibhav Suryavanshi: 'There will be failures'
Article Text:
Ravi Shastri and Vaibhav Suryavanshi

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Should selectors prioritize in-form players for the national team? Only if they fit the team strategy No, focus on long-term potential Yes, always pick in-form players

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Former India coach Ravi Shastri has heaped praise on a new wave of IPL batting talents, identifying four young players he believes are destined for international cricket, while also offering a note of caution for a teenage prodigy making headlines.Also See: IPL Live Score, KKR vs PBKS Speaking on The ICC Review, Shastri revealed he has been blown away by the fearless performances of Chennai Super Kings ‚Äô Ayush Mhatre , Rajasthan Royals ‚Äô Vaibhav Suryavanshi , and Punjab Kings ‚Äô opening pair Priyansh Arya and Prabhsimran Singh ."The two Punjab openers (Arya and Singh) as well, they give it a smack," Shastri said. "It's as if these youngsters, 14 years, 17 years of age, come in and see it, hit it in the first six overs."Arya, 23, has been particularly explosive, scoring 254 runs from eight innings at a jaw-dropping strike rate of 201.58, including a stunning century against CSK. Meanwhile, 17-year-old Mhatre has impressed with his fearless strokeplay, smashing 32 off just 15 balls against a star-studded Mumbai Indians line-up."The shots Ayush Mhatre played against the Mumbai Indians were unbelievable," Shastri marvelled. "For a 17-year-old to come out and express himself that way, he caught everyone's eye. If he's handled properly and surrounded by the right people, he can go a long way."Shastri also highlighted 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi, who struck a whirlwind 34 off 20 balls, including a six off his very first delivery in the IPL. But while he praised Suryavanshi‚Äôs audacity, he also urged caution."The first shot he played would have taken everyone's breath away," Shastri said. "But he's young. There will be failures. It‚Äôs about how he handles them."Shastri warned that Suryavanshi‚Äôs early success will attract tougher challenges. "People will come up with new things. Lots of short stuff will be thrown at him. When you tonk someone's first ball for six, there‚Äôs no mercy. He'll have to get used to that."The former India coach noted the depth in India's white-ball talent pool, but urged selectors to seize the moment with in-form players."If you think someone is hot and ticking most boxes, pick him," Shastri stressed. "Don't wait for next season. Strike while the iron is hot."
Article Summary: Ravi shastri has heaped praise on a new wave of ipl batting talents. Former india coach identifies four young players he believes are destined for international cricket. Chennai super kings‚Äô ayush mhatre, rajasthan royals ‚Äô vaibhav suryavanshi, and punjab kings ‚Äô opening pair priyansh arya and prabhsimran singh.

Article Title: Single? Dating? Shubman Gill sets the record straight on his relationship status
Article Text:
Shubman Gill

Also visit:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How often do you think athletes should address rumors about their personal lives? They shouldn't address them at all Whenever they feel like it Only when it directly affects their career

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: India and Gujarat Titans batter Shubman Gill has put an end to persistent rumours about his personal life, calling the speculation around his relationships "ridiculous." Speaking to Hollywood Reporter India, the 25-year-old clarified that he has been single for over three years and is unfazed by the constant gossip."I've been single for over three years, and so many speculations and rumours link me with different people. Sometimes, it's so ridiculous because I haven't even met the person in my life. It's bizarre," Gill said, addressing the ongoing chatter surrounding his private life.Focused solely on his career, Gill explained that his busy cricketing schedule leaves him little room for relationships. "We're on the road for about 300 days a year. There‚Äôs hardly any time to be with someone or invest the time needed for a relationship," he stated.Gill also opened up about handling crowd chants linking him to various celebrities during matches. He revealed that once he steps onto the field, he is so deeply focused that he barely registers the noise from the stands."When you're batting, you don't hear those chants. You're completely zoned in ‚Äî thinking about gaps, bowlers, next shots," he explained. "But while fielding, especially near the boundary, you do hear them sometimes."Gill‚Äôs straightforward comments have once again highlighted his commitment to his craft, as he continues to be one of India's most promising young stars both in international cricket and the IPL.
Article Summary: India and gujarat titans batter shubman gill has put an end to persistent rumours about his personal life. The 25-year-old clarified that he has been single for over three years. Gill also opened up about handling crowd chants linking him to various celebrities.

Article Title: IPL 2025: KKR drop Moeen Ali, bring in Rs 1.5 crore star against Punjab Kings
Article Text:
Kolkata Knight Riders' Ajinkya Rahane and Punjab Kings' captain Shreyas Iyer (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

Teams:

Kolkata Knight Riders:

Punjab Kings:

NEW DELHI: In a significant move ahead of their crucial IPL 2025 clash against Punjab Kings (PBKS), Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) dropped Moeen Ali and brought in Caribbean all-rounder Rovman Powell , who was bought for Rs 1.5 crore in the auction.Along with Powell, KKR also handed a game to left-arm pacer Chetan Sakariya, replacing Ramandeep Singh.At the toss, Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer elected to bat first at Eden Gardens . PBKS made two changes as well, bringing in Glenn Maxwell and Azmatullah Omarzai for Marcus Stoinis and Xavier Bartlett.KKR skipper Ajinkya Rahane stressed the importance of positive cricket at the toss. He acknowledged the team‚Äôs struggles with the bat and called for a braver approach. "The bowling unit has done well, but our batters need to be more fearless," Rahane said.This fixture carries extra emotional weight, with Shreyas Iyer returning to Eden Gardens in opposition colours.Just last season, Iyer led KKR to their first title in ten years. Released in a surprise off-season decision, Iyer has flourished at PBKS under Ricky Ponting‚Äôs guidance, taking his side into the playoff hunt. He has already scored 263 runs this season, though he arrives for this game with a slight dip in form.KKR, meanwhile, are desperate to revive their campaign after five losses in eight games. Their batting lineup has lacked consistency, with Andre Russell and Rinku Singh struggling for finishes. The inclusion of Rovman Powell is expected to inject some much-needed power in the middle order.Spin, once KKR‚Äôs strength at Eden, has not yielded the expected results this season, adding to their headaches. Varun Chakaravarthy and Sunil Narine have been among wickets but haven‚Äôt dominated matches.Punjab Kings, on the other hand, appear more settled, with young talents like Priyansh Arya and key bowlers like Arshdeep Singh and Yuzvendra Chahal offering balance.KKR must win at least five of their remaining six games to realistically stay in the playoff race.Rahmanullah Gurbaz (wk), Sunil Narine, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Venkatesh Iyer, Rinku Singh, Andre Russell, Rovman Powell, Vaibhav Arora, Chetan Sakariya, Harshit Rana, Varun Chakaravarthy.Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, Shreyas Iyer (c), Josh Inglis (wk), Nehal Wadhera, Shashank Singh, Glenn Maxwell, Azmatullah Omarzai, Marco Jansen, Arshdeep Singh, Yuzvendra Chahal.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders (kkr) drop moeen ali and bring in rovman powell. Punjab kings captain shreyas iyer elected to bat first at eden gardens. Kkr must win at least five of their remaining six games to realistically stay in the playoff race.

Article Title: 'MS Dhoni aisa auction nahi kar sakta tha': Suresh Raina blasts CSK management amid poor IPL form
Article Text:
MS Dhoni (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shah Rukh Khan: The superstar who turned IPL into a blockbuster

NEW DELHI: Former Chennai Super Kings star Suresh Raina has come down heavily on the CSK management following the team's continued struggles in IPL 2025. Raina expressed his disappointment after CSK suffered a five-wicket defeat to Sunrisers Hyderabad at Chepauk on Friday, a loss that left their playoff hopes hanging by a thread.Raina, speaking on Star Sports Network, said MS Dhoni ‚Äôs deep involvement in the team‚Äôs operations meant poor auction decisions were unlikely during his peak years.Also See: PBKS vs KKR Live Score, IPL 2025 ‚ÄúKashi sir has handled the administration for 30-40 years now, and now Rupa ma'am is managing cricket affairs like player recruitment. In the past, even if MS wasn‚Äôt physically at the auction, he was involved in every discussion. But this time, MS knows it was not a good auction... (Dhoni asa auction nahi kar shakta) Dhoni would never have allowed a bad auction,‚Äù Raina said.Highlighting Dhoni‚Äôs commitment, Raina pointed out that even at 43, Dhoni is still leading from the front, keeping wickets and captaining the side with full effort."He‚Äôs playing for the brand, the name, and the fans. But what about the others? Players bought for Rs 18‚Äì20 crores aren‚Äôt stepping up when it matters."Raina emphasised that some of the long-serving players continue to repeat mistakes, and accountability is needed. ‚ÄúMS doesn‚Äôt need anyone to tell him what‚Äôs going wrong. The way he walked off after the toss and post-match, a big meeting is surely on the cards," Raina concluded.Meanwhile, Sunrisers Hyderabad broke their Chepauk jinx with a comfortable chase of 155, riding on Ishan Kishan‚Äôs 44 and Kamindu Mendis‚Äôs unbeaten 32.Hyderabad's bowlers, led by Harshal Patel (4-28) and Pat Cummins (2-21), restricted CSK to just 154.Chennai‚Äôs batting woes continued as Shaik Rasheed, Sam Curran, and Ayush Mahtre fell cheaply, despite Dewald Brevis‚Äô promising 42 on debut.With their seventh defeat, CSK, currently down in the last position on the IPL points table, now face an uphill task to reach the playoffs.
Article Summary: Former chennai super kings star suresh raina has come down heavily on the csk management. Raina expressed his disappointment after csk suffered a five-wicket defeat to sunrisers hyderabad at chepauk on friday.

Article Title: 'Jadeja's strike rate is useless': Sehwag slams CSK batting approach after fourth straight home defeat
Article Text:
Chennai Super Kings‚Äô Ravindra Jadeja being bowled by Sunrisers Hyderabad‚Äôs Kamindu Mendis. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you agree with Virender Sehwag's criticism of CSK's batting performance? Not sure Disagree Partially agree Absolutely agree

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings ' Indian Premier League 2025 campaign hit a new low on Friday as they suffered their seventh defeat of the season, losing to Sunrisers Hyderabad by five wickets at the MA Chidambaram Stadium . It was CSK's fourth consecutive home loss this year and SRH's first-ever win at the Chepauk.Also See: IPL Live Score, KKR vs PBKS Batting first, CSK struggled against SRH's disciplined attack, folding for 154 in 19.5 overs. Only Ayush Mhatre (30 off 19) and Dewald Brevis (42 off 25) offered notable resistance. Harshal Patel led SRH's bowling with impressive figures of 4 for 28.Former India opener Virender Sehwag did not hold back in his criticism of CSK's batting display, particularly questioning the promotion of Ravindra Jadeja. "If Jadeja has come up, Jadeja's strike rate is useless, but at least he should bat till the 15th-18th over so others can play around him," Sehwag said on Cricbuzz. "None of the batters took responsibility. Wickets kept falling and nobody stayed long enough to anchor the innings."Sehwag also expressed frustration over CSK's confused batting order. "It is beyond my understanding. If you bring Brevis in, play him at No.3, Shivam Dube at 4, and Jadeja after that. Sam Curran can follow. But no one is scoring consistently. When Ruturaj Gaikwad left, they lost a player who could at least score at a strike rate of 140-160 and hold the innings together," he added.With playoffs slipping away, CSK now face a tough task to revive their faltering season.
Article Summary: Chennai super kings lose to sunrisers hyderabad by five wickets. It was csk's fourth consecutive home loss this year and srh's first-ever win at the chepauk. Former india opener virender sehwag criticised the batting display of csk.

Article Title: T20 Mumbai League: Abhishek Nayar appointed as mentor of Mumbai South Central Maratha Royals
Article Text:
Abhishek Nayar (@KKRiders on X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

Shah Rukh Khan: The superstar who turned IPL into a blockbuster

MUMBAI: Abhishek Nayar may no longer be the assistant coach of the Indian team, but he's already in the support staff of two teams. After he was named as the assistant coach of the IPL defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders recently, Nayar has been appointed as the mentor of Mumbai South Central Maratha Royals , owned by Royal Edge Sports & Entertainment (consortium of Kapil Sons Explosives LLP, Cutting Edge Events & Ranjit Singh Bindra), one of the two newly-auctioned teams in the T20 Mumbai League - Season 3, which is set to begin on May 26.Former Mumbai seamer Amit Dani will be the head coach of the team.Meanwhile, former India seamer and ex-India bowling coach Paras Mhambrey , currently the bowling coach of the Mumbai Indians , will be the mentor of ARCS Andheri. Former Mumbai left-arm spinner Rajesh Pawar will be the Andheri team's assistant coach. Former India team masseur Ramesh Mane will be the team masseur, while ex-Mumbai strength and conditioning coach Amogh Pandit will be the trainer of the side.Current Mumbai head coach Omkar Salvi is set to be the head coach of SoBo Mumbai Falcons, owned by Roadway Solutions India Infra Ltd.Former Mumbai, Rajasthan Royals and Gujarat Lions leg-spinner Pravin Tambe is the head coach of North Mumbai Panthers, while Tambe's assistant coach is Yogesh Pawar. Former Mumbai seamer Atul Ranade, currently the assistant coach of Vidarbha, has been appointed as the head coach of Triumph Knights Mumbai North East - a team he coached in the first two seasons too, before the league was halted due to covid.Tambe, who took 28 wickets in 33 matches in the IPL in which he debuted well into his 40s, played for the North Mumbai Panthers team when they won the championship when it was last held, in 2019, beating Sobo Supersonics in the final. On Saturday, the governing council of MCA held an 'orientation' with all the eight team owners and their support staff at the MCA Lounge.‚ÄúAs the Mumbai Cricket Association (MCA), we are committed to promoting and empowering our local coaches and support staff, ensuring they receive greater opportunities to grow and contribute not only to Mumbai cricket but also to Indian cricket. By nurturing homegrown talent, we aim to strengthen the foundation of our cricketing ecosystem and create pathways for sustained excellence,‚Äù said Ajinkya Naik, President of Mumbai Cricket Association.Meanwhile, once a sensation in the IPL, Paul Valthaty has been named as the Indian Cricketers Association representative in the governing council of the upcoming league. The 40-year-old former Mumbai and Punjab Kings (then Kings XI Punjab) cricketer was in August last year named head coach of a Minor League Cricket club, Seattle Thunderbolts, in the USA. Valthaty retired from domestic cricket in 2023.Valthaty made an incredible impact in IPL 2011 for Punjab Kings, hitting the season's first hundred -- an unbeaten 120 against the Super Kings but failed to replicate that season's success in the following years. He went on to score 463 runs in 14 matches in the 2011 IPL season, and played four first-class and five List-A matches.The auction of the T20 Mumbai League, which is returning after a six-year hiatus, with the third edition will be held on May 7. 240 players will be up for sale in the auction. All the eight India players of Mumbai-India's T20 captain Suryakumar Yadav, Shreyas Iyer, Shardul Thakur, Ajinkya Rahane, Shivam Dube, Sarfaraz Khan, Tushar Deshpande and Prithvi Shaw will be icon players, who will be allotted to each team based on draw of lots. Each icon player will be allotted a fixed sum of Rs 20 lakh. The base price of a Ranji Trophy player will be Rs 10 lakhs, while the base price of other players will be Rs 2 lakhs. The auction purse for a team will be Rs 1 crore, with a maximum squad size of 18 players.Each team needs to have four Under-19 players in their 18-man squad. The league will have eight owners, with two new team owners in Sobo Mumbai Falcons and the Mumbai South Central. The Roadway Solutions India Infra Ltd. secured the operating rights of Team Sobo Mumbai Falcons for Rs 82 crore, while Royal Edge Sports & Entertainment acquired the team representing Mumbai South Central region for Rs 57 crore.
Article Summary: Abhishek nayar appointed as mentor of mumbai south central maratha royals. Former india seamer and ex-india bowling coach paras mhambrey will be mentor of arcs andheri. Former mumbai, rajasthan royals and gujarat lions leg-spinner pravin tambe is the head coach of north mumbai panthers.

Article Title: 'Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma moved to London because ...'
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma (Agency Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think celebrity couples should move abroad for privacy? No, they should embrace their fame. Yes, it's necessary for their well-being.

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Dr Sriram Nene, husband of Bollywood actor Madhuri Dixit, recently shared fresh insight into Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma 's decision to shift base to London.Also See: KKR vs PBKS, IPL Live Score Speaking during a YouTube conversation with content creator Ranveer Allahbadia, Dr Nene revealed that the celebrity couple moved to London to escape the intense public scrutiny they face in India.According to him, Anushka shared that living in India made it difficult for them to enjoy their success due to constant media and public attention.‚ÄúI have a lot of respect (for Virat Kohli). We‚Äôve met him multiple times; he‚Äôs just a decent human being,‚Äù Dr Nene said.‚ÄúI‚Äôll tell you something, and this is what you learn, they all put their pants on one leg at a time. We had a conversation with Anushka one day, and it was very interesting. They were thinking about moving to London because they can‚Äôt enjoy their success (here). And we appreciate what they go through, because anything they do attracts attention. We almost become isolated.‚ÄùThe couple has chosen a more low-key life abroad, seeking normalcy and privacy for their family while maintaining their professional commitments in India.Meanwhile, Virat Kohli continues to shine on the cricket field. In IPL 2025 , he recently broke the world record for most half-centuries at a single venue in T20 cricket, registering his 26th fifty at M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.His 42-ball 70 helped Royal Challengers Bengaluru clinch a crucial win against Rajasthan Royals.With this knock, Kohli also jumped to second place in the Orange Cap race and surpassed Chris Gayle‚Äôs tally for fifty-plus scores in T20s, showing that even as he balances a quieter personal life, his cricketing fire remains unstoppable.
Article Summary: Dr sriram nene says virat kohli and anushka sharma moved to london to escape the intense public scrutiny they face in india. The couple has chosen a more low-key life abroad, seeking normalcy and privacy for their family.

Article Title: After Yograj Singh's 'Chris Gayle' remark, Arjun Tendulkar now gets 'tomorrow's legend' tag - Watch
Article Text:
Arjun Tendulkar and Yograj Singh (Agency Photo)

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Arjun Tendulkar is once again making headlines. After Yograj Singh ‚Äôs bold prediction that Arjun could become the "next Chris Gayle " if he focuses more on his batting, a recent moment has added more fuel to the growing excitement around the young cricketer.The Mumbai Indians all-rounder was seen working closely with Zaheer Khan at a practice session.Also See: IPL Live Score, KKR vs PBKS In a video shared by Lucknow Super Giants ' official social media handles, the caption of the post reads, "Lessons today, legends tomorrow."Watch:Earlier, Yograj Singh, former cricketer and father of Yuvraj Singh, said in an interview that Arjun should shift his focus towards batting rather than bowling.He added that if Arjun trained under Yuvraj for three months, he could transform into a player with the explosive batting power of Chris Gayle.Arjun, 25, has already shown glimpses of his promise.In the 2022-23 domestic season, he scored a century on his Ranji Trophy debut for Goa, matching his father Sachin Tendulkar ‚Äôs iconic feat.Yograj mentioned that after training with him for just 12 days, Arjun made a strong statement by scoring a hundred, emphasising the youngster‚Äôs batting potential.Meanwhile, Mumbai Indians are gearing up for a crucial IPL 2025 match against Lucknow Super Giants at the Wankhede Stadium on Sunday. Both teams are locked at 10 points each from nine matches and are looking to secure their playoff chances.With Mumbai riding high on four straight wins and players like Rohit Sharma and Suryakumar Yadav returning to form, Arjun could soon find himself stepping up at a vital phase of the season.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians all-rounder seen working closely with zaheer khan at a practice session. Yograj singh said arjun could become the "next chris gayle " if he focuses more on his batting. Both teams are locked at 10 points each from nine matches and are looking to secure their playoff chances.

Article Title: KKR vs PBKS, IPL 2025: What is the cut-off time after Kolkata rain halts play at Eden Gardens?
Article Text:
Ground staff pulls rain covers after rain interrupted the play at Eden Gardens in Kolkata (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: Rain played spoilsport at Eden Gardens during the Kolkata Knight Riders versus Punjab Kings clash in IPL 2025, forcing players off the field after just one over of KKR‚Äôs innings. Kolkata were seven for no loss when the heavens opened up, accompanied by strong winds that made it tough for the groundstaff to manage the covers.As per match officials, overs would only start reducing if play couldn't resume by 10:35 PM local time.Until then, fans and players alike remained hopeful as visuals showed KKR players warming up near the sidelines once the rain eased.However, a full ground cover was in place, and the staff, struggling without sufficient weights, sat on the covers to prevent them from blowing away.Despite the tricky conditions, the night remained young with ample time for a possible restart.As per IPL playing conditions, The cut-off time for a 5-over contest is 11.44 pm IST.If the game is reduced to the minimum five overs, KKR will need to chase 61 runs.Before the interruption, Punjab Kings had posted a strong total of 201/4 thanks to brilliant half-centuries from Priyansh Arya and Prabhsimran Singh. Arya dazzled with a fluent 69 off 35 balls, while Prabhsimran overcame a slow start to hammer 83 off 49 balls. Their 120-run opening stand set the foundation for a massive score.However, Kolkata Knight Riders pulled things back in the death overs. Vaibhav Arora (2/34) and Andre Russell (1/27) were key in restricting the damage, with KKR conceding just 40 runs and grabbing two wickets in the final five overs.Arya and Prabhsimran had made merry on a true batting surface, unlike previous Eden Gardens pitches that tended to slow down. Arya‚Äôs elegant strokeplay and Prabhsimran‚Äôs late acceleration meant PBKS were initially eyeing 230-plus before KKR‚Äôs bowlers fought back.
Article Summary: Rain interrupts ipl 2025 clash between kolkata knight riders and punjab kings. Rain forced players off the field after just one over of kkr‚Äôs innings. Kkr were seven for no loss when the heavens opened up. Before the interruption, punjab kings had posted a strong total of 201/4.

Article Title: IPL 2025, KKR vs PBKS: What happens if rain washes out the match?
Article Text:
Eden Gardens (Pic credit: IPL)

Also visit:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: The Indian Premier League match between Kolkata Knight Riders and Punjab Kings at Eden Gardens was interrupted by sudden rain on Saturday, throwing the outcome into uncertainty.KKR had just begun their chase of a daunting 202-run target and were 7 for no loss after one over when rain forced the players off the field.With the showers showing no signs of relenting, the big question is: what happens if the match is completely washed out?If play does not resume even after utilising the extended one-hour window, the match will be declared a 'No Result,' and both teams will share one point each.In that case, Punjab Kings would move up to fourth in the standings with 11 points from nine matches (five wins, three losses, one no result), strengthening their playoff hopes. KKR, on the other hand, would remain in seventh place, moving to seven points from nine games (three wins, five losses, one no result).Earlier, Punjab Kings posted a strong total of 201 for 4, thanks to explosive half-centuries from Priyansh Arya and Prabhsimran Singh. The duo stitched a rapid 120-run opening stand in just 11.5 overs, with Arya smashing 69 off 35 balls and Prabhsimran crafting a brilliant 83 off 49 balls.However, Kolkata‚Äôs bowlers fought back at the death, restricting PBKS to 40 runs in the final five overs. Vaibhav Arora (2/34) and Andre Russell (1/27) led the fightback, keeping KKR in the hunt ‚Äî if the weather permits.
Article Summary: Punjab kings and kolkata knight riders were playing at eden gardens. Rain stopped play after one over and will not resume for another hour. If the match is declared a 'no result,' both teams will share one point each. Punjab kings move up to fourth in the standings with 11 points.
